name: finance-tracker
description: Personal Finance Tracker - Full-stack application for expense tracking, budget management, and financial reporting

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd backend && npm test" "cd frontend && npm test"

author: Finance Tracker Team
